mapper.select: select distinct p.id, p.parent_id, p.name, p.code, p.description, p.path, p.menu, p.icon, p.component, p.type, p.create_time, p.update_time from permission p left join role_permission rp on rp.permission_id = p.id left join user_role ur on ur.role_id = rp.role_id and ur.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct p.code from permission p left join role_permission rp on rp.permission_id = p.id left join user_role ur on ur.role_id = rp.role_id left join user u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.id = #{userId}
